summary: Documentary follows Bobby Liebling, lead singer of seminal hard rock/heavy metal band Pentagram, as he battles decades of hard drug addiction and personal demons to try and get his life back.
cast: Bobby Liebling|Diane Liebling|Joe Liebling|Sean Pelletier|Ian Christie|Callae Goltz|J.B. Beverley|Victor Griffin|Joe Hasselvander|Geof O'Keefe|Greg Mayne|Murray Krugman|Hallie Miller|Kayt Vigil|Jimmy Bower|Phil Anselmo|Russ Strahan|Gary Isom|Jeremy Blessing|Bob Sweeney|Chad Pfeiffer|Sean-Paul Fenton|Derrick Hans|Demian Fenton|Domenic Malandro
title: Last Days Here
